caption.p: In vitro tyrosinase inhibition ( A) and α-amylase inhibition ( B) of the essential oil of different Ferula species, F. caratavica ( Fc), F. kuchistanica ( Fk), F. pseudoreoselinum ( Fp), F. samarcandica ( Fs), F. tenuisecta ( Ft) and F. varia ( Fv). Different letters (a–f) indicate significant differences in the tested Ferula species ( p < 0.05).
